attributes.action: Raise the threshold for paying the higher rate (40%) of income tax to a realistic figure nearer £40,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The threshold above which individuals start to pay the higher rate (40%)of income tax is currently £34,600.  This means that an inordinately large proportion of UK earners are in the higher tax bracket. This is iniquitous and the threshold should be raised to at least £40,000 if not higher.
